start_boss.text: This battle will bring much glory to our house!
Fight well, and if necessary, die well!
Today is a good day to die!

need_help.text: We are surrounded by enemies! Keep firing!
They are on us like a pack of rabid targ!

pursuing.text: Ha! They are afraid to die in battle!
Let them run. Their cowardice will stalk them.
Send them howling to Gre'thor like the cowards they are!

running.text: Only a fool fights in a burning house!

hull_90.text: Interesting. Maybe they can fight after all.

hull_30.text: Today is a good day to die!
There is no dishonour in death.

victory.text: If winning is not important, why keep score?
